title: High Ping even though the internet is fine
body:
In every game since the 5.16 patch my ping jumps from ~50 to 300 and any number in-between, making it impossible to play. I only have an issue with this game. My speed when browsing or downloading are normal, my set up hasn't changed and I haven't changed any settings either.

Anyone have any clues on what the cause could be?

ALSO  part way through the match I always get disconnected for a minute or so before reconnecting automatically.

Edit Again: When I ping the OCE servers I get 5-6 replies at 51-52ms, then one at 170-350ms, 5 more at 51-52ms, then a Request timed out. From here the cycle repeats itself.

replies.body:
i did a ping too and i seem to be getting 1k+ms every 2nd reply and <20ms every other time.

it just seems to stick to 300+ms throughout game
riot pls :)

Yes i am having this exact problem minus the D/C, its fine for a minute but then will go up to 500 ping or whatever stupid amount! and jsut keep repeating itself. Really frustrating i have tried resetting my router multiple times to no avail. Its been ever since this new patch so i dont know whats happening.
